author: wn.com
title: A broad program to uplift sports – President (The President of the Democratic Socialist Republic ...
text: ( Source : The President of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka ) President Maithripala Sirisena said an extensive program will be implemented to provide assistance to uplift the field of sports in collaboration with all sectors.
